greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse binomial transform of A014217.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-3,-1,2).
formula: a(n) = (-1)^(n+1)*(2^(n-1) -F(n+1) -F(n-1)), where F(n) = A000045(n), for n>=1, with a(0)=1. - _Johannes W. Meijer_, Aug 15 2010
program: (Magma) [1] cat [(-1)^n*( Lucas(n) - 2^(n-1) ): n in [1..40]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 14 2021
(Sage) [1]+[(-1)^n*( lucas_number2(n,1,-1) - 2^(n-1) ) for n in (1..40)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 14 2021
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Sep 21 2008
ext: Edited and extended by _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 22 2008
